directions: Sauté onions, bell pepper, garlic, and jalapeño in oil in a 4-quart heavy pot over moderately high heat, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add chili powder, cumin, and salt and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add tomatoes with juice and zucchini and simmer, partially covered, stirring occasionally, 15 minutes. Stir in beans and chocolate and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Stir in cilantro.
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1/2 fresh jalapeño chile, finely chopped (including seeds)
28-ounce can whole tomatoes, coarsely chopped, with juice
title: Vegetable and Bean Chili
